long_description: since the carrillo law firm, p.c. opened in may of 2007, our group has concentrated on insurance defense, civil litigation, business litigation, employment law and litigation, civil rights law and litigation, and real estate. when necessary, we have a broad network of contract attorneys and other professional relationships whom we may call upon to meet a client's needs. focus on business — carrillo law firm, p.c. is an all-in-one office that handles every type of business law case — from litigation to civil rights. extensive experience — our attorneys have more than 40 combined years of legal experience. contact the carrillo law firm, p.c. today. two of the firm's attorneys are bilingual — english and spanish speakers — and the majority of the staff is also bilingual, for your convenience.

generated_description: carrillo law firm, legally known as carrillo law firm p.c., is a legal practice based in las cruces, new mexico, specializing in business law, employment law, and banking law. established in may 2007, the firm handles a wide range of legal cases, including insurance defense, civil litigation, business litigation, employment law, civil rights law, and real estate. the firm is known for its small firm environment, where attorneys provide personalized attention to clients. the team, led by raúl a. carrillo, jr. and raymond l. romero, has over 40 years of combined legal experience. serves clients throughout new mexico and west texas, offering both consultation and litigation services.
